paragraphs.content: Chapter 19
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 19

paragraphs.content: Then Job answered and said,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Job answered and said,

paragraphs.content: How long will ye vex my soul, and break me in pieces with words?
paragraphs.contentHtml: How long will ye vex my soul, and break me in pieces with words?

paragraphs.content: These ten times have ye reproached me: ye are not ashamed that ye make yourselves strange to me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These ten times have ye reproached me: ye are not ashamed that ye make yourselves strange to me.

paragraphs.content: And be it indeed that I have erred, mine error remaineth with myself.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And be it indeed that I have erred, mine error remaineth with myself.

paragraphs.content: If indeed ye will magnify yourselves against me, and plead against me my reproach:
paragraphs.contentHtml: If indeed ye will magnify yourselves against me, and plead against me my reproach:

paragraphs.content: Know now that God hath overthrown me, and hath compassed me with his net.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Know now that God hath overthrown me, and hath compassed me with his net.

paragraphs.content: Behold, I cry out of wrong, but I am not heard: I cry aloud, but there is no judgment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I cry out of wrong, but I am not heard: I cry aloud, but there is no judgment.

paragraphs.content: He hath fenced up my way that I cannot pass, and he hath set darkness in my paths.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath fenced up my way that I cannot pass, and he hath set darkness in my paths.

paragraphs.content: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.

paragraphs.content: He hath destroyed me on every side, and I am gone: and mine hope hath he removed like a tree.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath destroyed me on every side, and I am gone: and mine hope hath he removed like a tree.

paragraphs.content: He hath also kindled his wrath against me, and he counteth me unto him as one of his enemies.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath also kindled his wrath against me, and he counteth me unto him as one of his enemies.

paragraphs.content: His troops come together, and raise up their way against me, and encamp round about my tabernacle.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His troops come together, and raise up their way against me, and encamp round about my tabernacle.

paragraphs.content: He hath put my brethren far from me, and mine acquaintance are verily estranged from me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath put my brethren far from me, and mine acquaintance are verily estranged from me.

paragraphs.content: My kinsfolk have failed, and my familiar friends have forgotten me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My kinsfolk have failed, and my familiar friends have forgotten me.

paragraphs.content: They that dwell in mine house, and my maids, count me for a stranger: I am an alien in their sight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that dwell in mine house, and my maids, count me for a stranger: I am an alien in their sight.

paragraphs.content: I called my servant, and he gave me no answer; I entreated him with my mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I called my servant, and he gave me no answer; I entreated him with my mouth.

paragraphs.content: My breath is strange to my wife, though I entreated for the children’s sake of mine own body.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My breath is strange to my wife, though I entreated for the children’s sake of mine own body.

paragraphs.content: Yea, young children despised me; I arose, and they spake against me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, young children despised me; I arose, and they spake against me.

paragraphs.content: All my inward friends abhorred me: and they whom I loved are turned against me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All my inward friends abhorred me: and they whom I loved are turned against me.

paragraphs.content: My bone cleaveth to my skin and to my flesh, and I am escaped with the skin of my teeth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My bone cleaveth to my skin and to my flesh, and I am escaped with the skin of my teeth.

paragraphs.content: Have pity upon me, have pity upon me, O ye my friends; for the hand of God hath touched me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Have pity upon me, have pity upon me, O ye my friends; for the hand of God hath touched me.

paragraphs.content: Why do ye persecute me as God, and are not satisfied with my flesh?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Why do ye persecute me as God, and are not satisfied with my flesh?

paragraphs.content: Oh that my words were now written! oh that they were printed in a book!
paragraphs.contentHtml: Oh that my words were now written! oh that they were printed in a book!

paragraphs.content: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!
paragraphs.contentHtml: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!

paragraphs.content: For I know that my redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth:
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I know that my redeemer liveth, and that he shall stand at the latter day upon the earth:

paragraphs.content: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:

paragraphs.content: Whom I shall see for myself, and mine eyes shall behold, and not another; though my reins be consumed within me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whom I shall see for myself, and mine eyes shall behold, and not another; though my reins be consumed within me.

paragraphs.content: But ye should say, Why persecute we him, seeing the root of the matter is found in me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: But ye should say, Why persecute we him, seeing the root of the matter is found in me?

paragraphs.content: Be ye afraid of the sword: for wrath bringeth the punishments of the sword, that ye may know there is a judgment.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Be ye afraid of the sword: for wrath bringeth the punishments of the sword, that ye may know there is a judgment.
